site.title: FarmConnect - One Stop Solution for Farmers
site.description: Comprehensive digital platform for Indian farmers with AI recommendations, marketplace, and community support

hero_section.description: AI-powered agricultural solutions, equipment rental, disease detection, and farmer community - all in one place. Boost your crop productivity and double your income.

features_section.title: Make Your Farming Smart
features_section.description: Boost your crop productivity with modern technology and AI power. All our tools are available on a single platform.

ai_crop_analysis.title: AI Crop Analysis
ai_crop_analysis.description: AI-powered analysis of your soil, weather, and crops. Get personalized recommendations for the best harvest.

equipment_rental.title: Equipment Rental
equipment_rental.description: Easily rent tractors, harvesters, and other agricultural equipment. Better prices and instant availability.

disease_detection.title: Disease Detection
disease_detection.description: Take a photo of your crop and instantly identify diseases. Get treatment methods and medicine information.

learning_hub.title: Learning Hub
learning_hub.description: Learn modern farming techniques. Video tutorials, AI tutor, and practical guides available.

farmer_community.title: Farmer Community
farmer_community.description: Connect with other farmers, share experiences, and find solutions. Active forum and discussions.

digital_marketplace.title: Digital Marketplace
digital_marketplace.description: Sell your crops directly to buyers. Better prices, instant payments, and transparent transactions.

how_it_works_section.title: How It Works?
how_it_works_section.description: Make your farming smart and increase your income in just three simple steps.

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create a free account and provide your farm information. Ready in just 2 minutes.

step2.title: Get AI Analysis
step2.description: Our AI analyzes your soil, weather, and crops to provide excellent recommendations.

step3.title: Increase Income
step3.description: Double your income with smart farming, better crops, and direct selling.

footer.description: The best digital platform built for Indian farmers. Make your farming smart with modern technology.
footer.copyright: © 2024 FarmConnect. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for Indian farmers.

farm_analysis_page.title: Farm Analysis
farm_analysis_page.description: This is the Farm Analysis page. Here you can view your farm information.

authentication_flow_page.title: Sign In / Sign Up
authentication_flow_page.description: This is the Authentication Flow page. Here you can sign in or sign up.

profile_creation_page.title: Create Profile
profile_creation_page.description: This is the Profile Creation page. Here you can create your profile.

equipment_rental_page.title: Equipment Rental
equipment_rental_page.description: This is the Equipment Rental page. Here you can rent equipment.

disease_detection_page.title: Disease Detection
disease_detection_page.description: This is the Disease Detection page. Here you can detect diseases in your crop.

learning_hub_page.title: Learning Hub
learning_hub_page.description: This is the Learning Hub page. Here you can learn about farming.

create_post_modal.title: Create New Post
create_post_modal.description_placeholder: Write your question or experience in detail...
